name: Maze Runner [Experimental] (A* Pathfinding)
description:
Maze Runner is a test to help me find out how to use A* pathfinding, Using Arongran Berg's pathfinding project.  In the game the blue box will get as close to the green box as it can (If the path is blocked).

     This is an Experimental Project it is not made to the standard of other projects. They are not well bug tested, Nor are they polished. For better games, check out my other projects.
